body:
@branlettehentai All I could find was the french version of Tanetsukemura Kenbunroku, also by Koyanagi, similarly poorly translated into english. Would be awesome if you could take a look!

https://hitomi.la/galleries/700103.html
@Sakari if you have the french source I could look and retranslate it properly.

The translations often make no sense either. I read on a board this was translated through a French version, so that explains something, but seriously... 

Where the Japanese version says, 
"Do you have an Oedipus complex or something?" 
this version manages to translate, 
"I wonder if Kanchan is useing pencil?"

That's right. I have no idea how that happened, but it's riddled with these kinds of errors. 

Still, the doujin itself is insanely hot. Pretty sure Koyanagi's my favourite artist now.
DAMNNNNNN THIS IS FUCKING AMAZINGGGGGGG XD
The typesetting is still atrocious, but hey, at long last a new Koyanagi work that's neither trap nor rape. That's a win in my book.
